column6: 我們是一個全球數位娛樂支付團隊，有超過3 000款數位娛樂內容合作廠商、擁有1 000萬用戶、年度交易金額達100億，如果你喜愛挑戰，樂於分享、嚮往自由的工作環境，歡迎您的加入。 職務說明： 配合公司營運與發展目標，與數據分析師合作進行會員行為分析及數據洞察，協助營運團隊進行進商業決策與商機探索。主要工作內容描述：1.熟悉ETL，能獨立彙整內外部資料，包含資料儲存、正規化、補缺值、清整、運算與基礎統計分析。2.與數據分析師合作，分析、詮釋使用者行為模式與偏好數據，進行會員分群經營與消費行為分析與預測。3.能以業務分析需求為出發點，主動挖掘問題並思考解決方案。4.與前後端工程師、數據分析師合作，參與公司大數據平台規劃與建置。5.獨立佈署/配置SQL Server，並熟悉T-SQL語法。6.熟悉並使用Python語言撰寫資料爬蟲程式。
column8: 1.具下列任一條件者尤佳2.熟悉GA及相關APP追蹤分析工具(如Firebase  AppsFlyer)。3.具遊戲、電商、網路營銷或數據分析相關產業工作經驗。 4.熟悉 CSS3、HTML5、JavaScript、jQuery、RESTful API 與 Ajax 的後端呼叫。5.熟悉分散式運算架構，如Hadoop  Spark。 6.熟悉 .Net MVC。

column6: 【職務說明】 1.提供客戶技術與系統架構分析規劃。 2.建立與規劃專案之相關技術的使用、開發規範、測試方式、發佈計劃、維護方式等。 3.與系統分析師合作，設計符合需求之系統程式。 4.具備良好溝通能力，有效與工程師(PG)溝通協調並進行任務分配及管理。  5.能獨立作業處理程式問題，找尋最佳解決方案。  【應徵條件】 1.3年以上的軟體系統設計師的經驗。 2.需具備品質/專案管理觀念，若有經驗者佳 3.具參與大型專案者佳。 4.帶領過10人以上專案團隊佳。 5.具備JAVA 或 .NET 程式能力。  6.熟以下技能者佳：軟/硬體架構、網路架構、程式架構規畫、跨系統介接整合、系統模組化/元件設計、程式流程設計、資料庫設計、操作界面設計、資料規劃/設計等（包括功能正確性、效能、資安、系統備份、備援與容錯能力(HA)、認證授權、Log、例外處理、批次處理、資料轉移等）

column1: 網站前端/全端工程師 (Front-end Engineer, F2E)
column2: 意藍資訊股份有限公司
column3: 台北市大安區信義路四段184號6樓
column6: 本公司運用語意分析與雲端技術專長，推出全國規模最大的網路社群監測與分析平台《OpView社群口碑資料庫》及《PeopleView人群資料庫》，廣泛地應用在行銷廣告、公關客服、品牌及市場研究上，能夠在數億筆的雲端資料庫內，精確地分析網路上的口碑聲量，以及消費者和市場的樣貌，是數位行銷時代重要的工具，因此本公司招募想積極投身這波浪潮的人才一同加入。  A. 工作内容 1. 以n-tier系統架構，設計開發大數據分析及圖表、報表產製等功能 2. 參與網站設計、開發、建置、測試與維護 3. 優化前端效能，處理大量資料運算及視覺化呈現，發掘最佳設計方式 4. 與UX使用者經驗設計師及UI介面設計師持續溝通合作 5. 熱愛學習，自動自發，安排自己學習進度，享受團隊一起完成專案的成就感 6. 新人有mentor帶領及完善教育訓練  B. 職務需求 1. 熟悉JavaScript  HTML5  CSS3，了解主流瀏覽器的開發限制 2. 使用過Bootstrap  jQuery  Highcharts  D3.js等任何JavaScript套件 3. 有AJAX  RESTful API使用經驗 4. 有MVC概念或任一MVC框架開發經驗(Spring  Laravel  Django  Rails) 5. 有響應式網頁設計(Responsive Web Design)  Waterfall layout概念或開發經驗  C. 加分條件 1. 有Java程式或網站開發經驗 2. 有RESTful API設計及開發經驗 3. 有物件導向程式設計(Object-oriented programming)經驗 4. 知道JavaScript的data type  prototype  hoisting  module pattern等特性 5. 關聯式資料庫使用經驗(MS SQL Server  MariaDB  MySQL、PostgreSQL任一)

column6: ‧ 你對機器學習、分散式系統有源源不絕的熱忱嗎?‧ 你擁有打不死的好奇心，喜歡耐著性子追根究底嗎?‧ 你擅長靈活思考與行動，不斷探索、驗證與思考如何突破瓶頸?我們正尋找擁有這樣特質的你……一起扮演現代福爾摩斯，加入趨勢科技Core Tech Holmes Project!在這個團隊，你可以~* 悠遊於千萬筆的Real Data中，分析全球網路使用者行為及日新月異的病毒資料* 從龐雜無盡的資料中找出潛在的抽象規則，依據數據結果設計並建構模型來提供解決方案、預測使用者/病毒行為* 透過與其他軟體研發人員的合作，參與趨勢核心threat projects  提升資安相關的技術和問題處理流程，以增加技術的廣度利用  Machine Learning及Deep Learning ，讓我們一起來訓練智慧的科技腦。透過資料學習，不斷調整模型的構成，抽絲剝繭，從平凡中挖掘黑暗威脅的跡象。讓我們一起來發揮資料的技術力，在巨人的肩膀上發現問題的脈絡，創造AI大未來!Welcome to join us! Be one of our Holmes!Seeking for candidate who is able to create scalable solution by applying machine learning techniques for customer-facing problems.1. Will be dealing with huge amount of data to identify new type of fast-changing internet threat2. Will closely work with development team to express the novelty ideas and turn it into productive solution to solve the real world case.3. Will closely communicate with Operation and Field Support to understand customer-facing problems and optimize the machine learning techniques to solve customer’s problem4. Will research on innovative machine learning technique that could solve real world challenging cases

column1: FLUX Junior 全端工程師 Junior Full-Stack Engineer
column2: 通量三維股份有限公司
column3: 台北市南港區重陽路459號7樓
column6: 加入 FLUX，一起來打造創客工具！  我們相信提供直覺、易用的數位自造工具幫助人們實現創意，可以為世界創造更多價值。FLUX 團隊於 2014 年 3 月在臺北草創，早期即凝聚了硬體、軟體、和設計的各方人才，帶著共同對設計和自造精神的熱愛而成立。同年前往美國矽谷發展，並將結合 3D 列印、雷射雕刻等數位創作功能的數位成型機 － FLUX Delta 放上 Kickstarter 群眾募資平台，成功募得 164 萬美金並打破臺灣歷史紀錄。產品亦獲得德國紅點設計獎、德國 iF Award 金質獎、CES 創新獎等業界知名獎項肯定。  2016 年，成功將第一代產品出貨至世界各地 64 個國家。2017 年，推出第二代 FLUX Delta，以及 Beambox 桌上雷射切割機。今年，FLUX 將持續帶著對數位創作的熱忱，為世界各地持續提供最棒的產品。  現在，FLUX 正在尋找一樣熱愛科技、設計、創作和生活的你。  【相關連結】 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2117384013/flux-all-in-one-3d-printer-unlimited-elegant-simpl 德國 iF Award 金質獎: http://ifworlddesignguide.com/entry/173220-flux-delta Techcrunch 報導：https://techcrunch.com/2014/11/11/fluxs-3d-printer-is-also-a-scanner-laser-engraver-and-more-thanks-to-a-modular-design/  【徵才條件】 - 高速學習能力，能在不同情境下選擇最具效率的架構與框架 - 對最新的科技與技術充滿熱情 - 具備良好的溝通表達能力和團隊合作精神 - 在變化迅速極快的環境中能夠有效率的獨立作業  【經驗需求】 不拘，新鮮人可。  【技能需求】 - 熟悉 JavaScript - 熟悉 C or C++ - 產品技術面跨度大，會有基礎培訓  【加分條件】 - 熟悉 React 開發環境 - 熟悉 Git 版本控制、單元測試以及 Jenkins 持續整合開發環境 - 熟悉 Linux 開發環境 - 網站開發相關經驗 (Django  PHP  Node.js  SQL) - 熟悉 Python - Electron 使用經驗 - STM32  Arduino  Raspberry Pi 嵌入式系統開發相關經驗 - ROS 相關經驗  【工作內容】 - FLUX Studio 開發: 開發桌面 Web-Based 應用，整合 Python & C 後端 API。 - 3D 列印機與雷射切割機韌體開發: 嵌入式系統韌體開發與優化 (C語言)。 - 新產品設計與開發 - 以專業技能角度思考如何提升使用者體驗  【福利制度】 - 舒適的辦公環境、活力的工作夥伴、提供免費零食飲料 - 美國日本出差機會 - 技術類書籍免費補助購買 - 辦公室 Makerspace 三寶免費用 - 3D 列印，雷射切割，桌上 CNC - 國際化的產品以及世界級的舞台讓你發揮 - 周休二日、彈性上下班時間 - 享有勞、健保 - 每年特休 20 天 - 員工分紅入股及選擇權  【聯絡人/連絡方式】 請 Email 你的個人簡歷與作品集 (你的 Github、網站 Link 或其他作品介紹資料) 至 info@flux3dp.com

column6: Company Description  www.citiesocial.com  【各地精選  在地發現 Global Curation  Local Discovery】是我們的宗旨。我們透過高標準選品、數字化行銷操作與高效率平台開發，突破台灣電商市場‭ (‬NT$1兆元‭) ‬的傳統大賣場操作模式，提供消費者更有價值的購物經驗，打造發現新好商品的穩固橋樑。   citiesocial‭ ‬於‭ ‬2011‭ ‬年成立，至今已累積‭超過 ‬60 萬名忠實會員，每月造訪次數數百萬，citiesocial‭ ‬所有的成長來自團隊，我們正在尋找新‭ ‬Team‭ ‬Member 一起加入這場零售市場革命！！   Job Description  擔任「Python 工程師」您將協助系統開發、程式管理及雲端大數據資料分析。您將深入學習 citiesocial 的技術作業流程，瞭解如何透過精準的資料探索及人工智慧來進行網路銷售分析及預測，同時您將熟悉垂直性電子商務的技術及經營模式。  1. 熟悉 Python 及 Django Framework  2. 理解 CSS3  JavaScript  and HTML5 3. 使用 Git / AWS / Slack / Spark / Jenkins 4. 對數據資料分析有強烈興趣
column8: 1) 一年以上 Python/Django 網站開發經驗 2) 有自主學習能力、熱愛技術研究 2) 撰寫單元測試及 CI 經驗 3) 熟悉 gitflow 開發流程 4) 熟悉 HTML  CSS 及 JavaScript 5) 良好的技術相關英語能力 6) 態度積極認真，耐心負責，良好的團隊溝通及問題解決能力 7) 具電子商務概念者優先考慮

column2: 香港商雅虎資訊股份有限公司(Yahoo!奇摩)
column3: 台北市南港區三重路66號14樓
column6: Department DescriptionThe Yahoo Search group is about providing the right information to the right people at the right time; whether the user is looking for the perfect gift  the perfect restaurant  or the perfect answer to one of life’s many questions. Our portfolio includes products from Yahoo Search to Yahoo Answers and all the backend systems that gather  process  and refine the myriad data points of our digital lives to make Yahoo Search the best  and most personalized  experience in the Search space for our users. We provide Advertising & Search solutions for our partners and advertisers across many of the Yahoo products that users use on a daily basis to bring the best value in connecting people with the data that they want.A Little About UsYahoo Search Production (DevOps) Engineering is a unique function that it resolves production environment and operations challenges as if they are software problems. We strive to delight hundreds of millions of daily search users with highly scalable and reliable environment. We work to make sure that they are able to get what they want when they want it. We work closely with the rest of the business unit - Product  Development  Testing and Business teams - to support our goals of providing the best Search experiences in the industry. We integrate with the entire product lifecycle so as to be able to provide support for the agility that is requisite in this industry. In this we are responsible for service quality  performance and delivery to the Yahoo users across the globe. We leverage industry standards and best practices in order to achieve these high standards.A Lot About YouAs a DevOps Engineer  you will be responsible for production operations  capacity planning  performance management  deployment and release engineering. You will work with multiple cross-functional teams helping deliver the new and better experiences to our users while ensuring reliability and performance of the Search services. You are the type of person who will jump in to debug and fix things  multitasks and context-switches well. You have strong understanding of best practices across a variety of disciplines including: Web Operation  System Administration  Release management  Performance Engineering and Network Operations.Your Day- Maintain and support production systems and their associated infrastructure and tools.- Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand the product and technical roadmap and manage impact to the operability of systems.- Provide in-depth and timely solutions to complex technical issues  related to both site-up issues and product improvements.- Maintain and improve the availability  performance  scalability and efficiency of the services by implementing monitoring  automation  redundancy  capacity and business-continuity planning.- Work closely with Quality and Release Engineering teams to facilitate release pipelines and enable the continuous deployment- Participation in on-call pager rotationYou Must Have- Computer Science degree or equivalent- 2+ years of hands-on experience supporting Unix based production preferred- Good understanding of UNIX systems (PREFERRED: RHEL)- Good understanding of IP networking concepts- Experience with scripting on Python and/or Ruby- Good understanding of monitoring and alerting best practices- Knowledge of Performance tuning & ITIL standards i.e. Change management  incident management preferred- Experience with Continuous Deployment preferred- Experience with Chef  Puppet  and/or other tools in production environments at scale preferred

column6: FriendFinder Networks is looking for a Python Developer who will work with cross functional teams to design  develop  and test Python/Javascript code for web applications that are highly scalable. Your contributions will ensure FriendFinder Networks will continue to provide our customers the best possible user experience for everyone who visits our web sites 24 hours a day  every day of the year  all over the world.  WHAT YOU WILL DO *         Will develop and update the backend code *         Will write  design  and implement code using Python and other technologies *         Will confer with management and cross-functional teams in the development process from start to finish *         Will develop and execute unit test for product components *         Will work with QA Technicians to resolve issues before going live *       Will troubleshoot and debug applications that occur outside of the regular release cycle  WHAT YOU MUST HAVE *         Must have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field and/or equivalent work experience *         Must have 3 years' Python development and MySQL experience *         Must have 3 years' experience working with Object Oriented Programming and Service Oriented Architecture *         Experience in Redis  memcache *         Knowledge of Node.js  javascript programming language is a plus  WHAT YOU SHOULD HAVE *         Should be methodical in documenting and testing your own code *         Should be comfortable working independently and as a member of a cross functional team *         Should have excellent verbal and written communication skills *         Should have a high degree of honesty and integrity *         Should be deadline oriented and multi-tasking ability in a fast-paced environment *       Should be a team-player  positive attitude and flexible

column6: Job Description: The primary focus is to develop automation scripts and solutions for validating network interface cards (NIC) and converged network adapters (CNA) within server systems and solutions supporting high-speed data networking and various networking technologies including  but not limited to NPAR  VxLAN  SRIOV  RoCE  and iSCSI. Successful candidate will have demonstrated experience in designing  developing  and testing automation scripts. Must have experience with agile software development process  operation of various operating systems  and basic networking troubleshooting. Responsibilities: ➢ Work with technologists and engineers to develop test automation scripts in python ➢ Follow agile development process and have complete code review ➢ Conduct unit test to ensure the quality of deliverables ➢ Maintain clear development records and provide weekly report ➢ Support test engineers to adopt new automation solutions
column8: Basic Requirements: ➢ Bachelor or Master’s degree in computer science  information systems  or equivalent ➢ 4-6 years of hands-on experiences with developing automation scripts with python ➢ Familiarity with Robot framework ➢ Familiarity with various OS operation  such as Windows  RHEL  SLES  and VMware ➢ Understanding of basic networking principles ➢ Understanding of object-orientated programming ➢ Ability to effectively communicate design proposals and negotiate options ➢ Ability to communicate in English ➢ Ability to apply analytical and problem solving skills Advanced Requirements (plus): ➢ Familiarity with advanced server networking features  such as NPAR  XvLAN  SRIOV  RoCE  and iSCSI ➢ Experience with server products ➢ Experience with agile development process

column6: 歡迎 Python/Node js 後端人才   工作內容：  1.負責公司網站及 APP 之 API 開發  2.熟悉 Mongo DB  SQL  gRPC  RESTful  3.具有界接Web/Cloud API網路實務者佳(如AWS   Google API)   4.具備Python、Node js程式開發經驗能力者佳，或有志學習者  5.對金流及物聯網整合有相關經驗 或有興趣從事者   您會獲得 : 經營平台的機會、享受網站、APP進化的成就感，進軍國際舞台。  工作環境 : 全台數一數二最高檔的辦公環境，與優秀的團隊互動腦力激盪。  額外獎勵 : KPI廣大通路銷售分紅，由通路為您賺錢。   悄悄話 : 我們希望你擁有的特質 :  　良好的溝通力－清楚表達自己的想法  　聰明的解決力－妥善並獨立解決大小問題  　樂於吸收新知－對網路技術和程式設計充滿熱忱  　善於與人相處－你可以在這裡得到許多的好友  　熱愛學習與分享，享受新創團隊充滿挑戰性的生活  　具有廣度興趣，熱愛接收新鮮事物，能跟各領域人才交流學習  　個性活潑、積極與健談，抗壓性高，且有工作熱忱。   每個程式工程師年輕時，都該有個人生的代表作、成功作品，體現超越實踐功能的技術能力外，超越自己，做出眾人熱愛的產品，加入MyGo，就是加入國際舞台，加入MyGo就是加入對的商業模式，對的商業模式無比重要，加入不對的商業模式，浪費您寶貴生命。   MyGo MyGo.com / MyGoNews.com / MyGo APP創造了房地產個人化的時代，好比房產商業版本的臉書、或房地產版的UBER，讓仲介個人透過MyGo.com、MyGo Plus APP的線上服務能夠輕鬆創業。如果您想要成功、享受創造破壞性創新轟動市場的快感，立即加入我們團隊，讓我們一同將平台推廣至東協、至中國。讓世界看到台灣的榮耀。 創新的DNA就是本公司的特色，一次次創造出創新的作品，目標國際設計獎項，就是本公司設計團隊的目標。

column6: Keywords: backend  NoSQL  Linux  C  C++  Java  Python  cloud services   1. 豐富的網路科技產品開發經驗，大學以上學歷，電機/資工相關專業；具有豐富的網絡或移動後台搭建與編程經驗；熟悉業界內常用的開源工具，並在不同項目中有實際使用經驗；具備良好的分析解決問題能力，能獨立承擔任務和有項目進度把控能力。 2. 精通Linux/Unix操作系統上的C/C++/Java開發編程，熟悉Python  Shell等腳本語言。  3. 熟悉多進程、多線程、數據庫、IO、內存管理等方面編程；熟悉網路編程，精通TCP/IP協議及相關編程，在大數據量通訊存儲方面有專長者優先 4. 精通如下數據庫的一種或多種：MySQL  PostgreSQL  MongoDB  Neo4J；熟練使用Redis和Nginx；具有分布式系統或NoSQL開發經驗者優先。  5. 熟悉並使用過雲端服務，如亞馬遜AWS(EC2  S3  ElasticSearch  CloudFront等)；能夠根據項目實際情況選擇合適的雲服務並搭建和維護後台系統的正常運行。

column6: 月薪：8~12萬 職缺：Senior Python Developer 1人 (Fullstack or Platform)  Join us in building the best e-commerce SaaS platform to revolutionize how retailers engage with shoppers for post-purchase activities. Linc is looking for Senior Software Developers who are passionate about their craft  who thrive on challenge and who believe in success through collaboration – people who would complement our existing team of world class developers! We offer a fun  dynamic and result-driven environment. If scale and complexity in a high growth startup excites you  Linc is the right place to be.  You should be experienced  diligent  and passionate  ready to join the team to help us build and run our innovative and business-changing SaaS-based applications at the highest level of quality. You will be a leader in the team  owner of major modules or systems  and a mentor to other software developers.  RESPONSIBILITIES * Build and maintain Linc’s SaaS application platform at the highest level of quality  service and availability * Architect  design and implement new functionality and product enhancements * Play a leading role in all phases of software development from planning  designing  implementation  testing  deployment  to day-to-day operation * Collaborate across entire product team to contribute to the analysis of functional requirements and overall system architecture * Document and communicate designs and interfaces for use by other engineers * Work and communicate with Sunnyvale colleagues closely across continents and timezones  KEY QUALIFICATIONS * 7+ years of experience in designing and developing large scale web applications using Python  Java or C++ * 3+ years of professional Python programming * Proficient in SQL relational database  Linux server environment and Git * Tech lead experience or equivalent * Master's degree in Computer Science or related field * Fluent verbal and written English skills  ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS FOR FULLSTACK DEVELOPER * 3+ years in JavaScript and CSS * Very good at AngularJS or ReactJS * Good at Django or NodeJS  ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS FOR PLATFORM DEVELOPER * Very good at MySQL or PostgreSQL * Good at Elasticsearch  MongoDB or DynamoDB * Familiar with Amazon cloud  Linux shell scripting and DevOps * Big data experiences strongly preferred (Hadoop  Spark  Cassendra  etc.)  HUGE PLUS * Silicon Valley company working experience (either in US or Taiwan) * Startup experience * AWS cloud experience * e-Commerce platform development experience  NOTE 1. Applicants are required to finish a Python coding test at home first. 2. We are not going to hire foreigners at this stage due to visa processing issue.

column2: 好好投資科技股份有限公司
column3: 台北市信義區松德路１６１號２樓之2
column6: 【好好技能】 1.具備獨立以 Python + MongoDB 開發後端資料庫能的能力( 過去需有實作經驗) 2.瞭解如何以 SQL 操作資料表，具備資料庫 Schema 設計能力 3.熟RESTful API 文件設計、架構開發、串接、測試及維護。  【好好嚴選】 我們正在找人，但尋志同道合，寧缺也不願濫選！我們不只找員工，更覓共同打拼的事業夥伴，雖是新創公司，但福利絕對優於上市公司。  您應該看得出，我們不同一般公司更認真仔細地徵才，注重每個環節，這是我們做好一件小事的標準，我們是站在世界金融科技風口的團隊，也是「79%」一定會成功的新創公司！這剩下「21%」的不確定，等待優秀且舉足輕重的您來為我們補足，如您只是帶著打工的心態，請不要來！如希望找到環境好，福利佳，能力快速成長的公司，歡迎您來試試看。  【好好認識】 好好投資科技是新創公司，也是一個築夢踏實的年輕團隊(但我們的志氣大到將會翻轉生態)  公司的產業正是目前站在風口的金融+科技 (Fintech)領域，現正開發一個很有趣且特別的財富管理平台(Coming soon)，您可先參觀官方形象網站：www.howinvest.com  我們對於金融遇見科技的未來有著具體想像，即將運用人工智慧打破投資的專業門檻，改變傳統理財顧問與投資人的互動方式，我們要讓最需要理財的小資族，用非常簡單的方式直覺性投資！  公司創始成員由來自金融實務界資深銀行家與外資證券老總的發起，工程團隊從前端、後端、資料庫、演算法工程師都是新世代創客。  【好好徵才】 (以下五項前提，任一未具備者勿投履歷) 1.對有金融科技有興趣與熱情，想參與最夯的金融科技專案。(您現在不需很懂金融，但要有興趣) 。 2.注重細節及使用流程，能從使用者角度思考。 3.對 Web、Mobile Web開發、新技術開發具高度興趣及熱忱。 4.具主動、獨立作業與思考能力、執行能力強、勇於跳出框架思考的能力。 5.能有良好溝通表達能力、擇善不固執及團隊精神。  【好好選擇】 1.我們重視工作氣氛，在這講求團隊互助合作， 鼓勵主動提案改善，不墨守成規，打造活力無限、笑聲不斷、樂在工作的熱血團隊。 2.我們重視技術人才的培育與職涯發展，提供內部技術交流學習、外部訓練課程(公司出資)，透過不同階段工作安排與規劃，工作輪調機制，培育各領域儲備人才，讓每位員工擁有個人發展舞台與空間。 3.我們重視員工生活，公司提供內外部各項參與社團活動、旅遊補助、電影欣賞等，讓您在工作之餘，可以安排個人休閒娛樂，享受工作，樂於生活。 4.內部環境自由，可自由參與其他大數據、PHP、資料庫等學習，不斷增加能力。  【好好薪資】 我們願意提供高於一般行情的薪酬，給具價值的您，確切薪資於面試時，將依實際能力/作品/經驗進行為最終核定，工作年資對我們不是非常重要。
column8: 加分條件 (非必備要件，具備則加分)： 1.對MVC Framework 等有基本認知佳。  2.不含學習時間，有超過一年以上後端開發經驗佳。 3.懂雲端暨大數據資料分析相關應用。 4.懂Git version control者佳 5.擁有 GitHub 帳號，喜歡自行創建實驗性專案者佳。 6.WebService/ AP I 開發、"串接"知識者佳 。  也歡迎碩博士在校學生Apply，我們彈性的工時可以讓您兼顧學業與工作。 [有相關開發經驗者優先錄取] (面試時需能Demo作品-金融相關尤佳)

RESTful API 建置 5. 工程文件和使用文件撰寫   【工作要求 】  1. 熟悉 Python (Django or Flask）開發方式及框架原理  2. 使用過 (React  Vue.js  AngularJS) 任何一種 Framework 3. 熟悉 PostgreSQL 或 MySQL 4. 熟悉 Git 5. 使用過 GCP or AWS 服務 6. 對商業有同等熱情 7. 理解 CI CD，並且會寫測試 8. 有 Github 帳號 9. 有 3 年以上軟體開發經驗    【加分條件】  1. 熟悉網站優化與 Server 效能調整（AWS）  2. 曾使用過 PHP 做為專案開發語言 3. 瞭解 MVC 架構，MVP（minimum viable product）概念 4. 參與過 Open Source Project 5. 有自己的技術分享部落格  6. 待過新創團隊、樂於參與開源社群 7. 至少參與開發過兩項網站專案  8. 經歷過 Sprint Scrum等方法論 9. 推動過 DevOps 文化    【其他福利】  1. 員工活動：定期出遊運動及健檢，每月一次讀書會與餐會  2. 工作配備：大螢幕任你挑，舒適明亮的工作環境  3. 學習基金：課程、講座，與購書補助，團隊一起成長與分享  4. 工時與假期：目標式管理、彈性工時，優於勞基法年假 5. 完善保險制度：勞健保、出差同仁旅遊平安險、團體意外險    【早餐吃麥片團隊要求】  1. 正直、會為用戶講話 2. 堅定、有毅力、講求不斷進步 3. 重視團隊合作，不拿翹 4. 精準且數據說話 5. 聰明、好奇，可提出和別人不同的 insight 6. 負責，不推卸，願意承認錯誤   ###應徵請提供完整履歷及個人作品（網站連結、GitHub 或 其他專案作品內容) 讓我們更快瞭解您，加快我們回覆速度，感謝###      早餐吃麥片提供消費者精挑細選過的產品，各式燕麥片、健康天然無負擔零嘴，精心編寫的麥片食譜與各類麥片好處與知識，幫助大家擁有更優雅的生活風格.. ，不到 1 年，我們累積了 20 幾萬的粉絲，目前擁有最齊全的麥片組合，還有天然的零嘴和沖泡品供大家選擇！  除了早餐吃麥片外（2016 年營收 1.9 億），2017 年初也成立了新的垂直網站運動吃蛋白，提供給台灣的運動族群更多夠好的飲食選擇！2017 年 5 月也悄悄到了馬來西亞成立公司，服務更多當地的族群，目前這個 16 人的高效小團隊正在籌備 2018 年全新的網站與 APP，以及新的商業嘗試，讓我們拭目以待他們能在台灣，甚至東南亞市場鑿下什麼樣的痕跡...      【公司歷史演進】  公司成立於 2013 年，為之初創投 Appworks 第四屆的新創團隊，曾出產出以下服務：1. 打卡美食排行榜 / 2. 先拍再吃手機 App (IOS 不分類排行榜 #2) / 3. 壹點心點心外送平台 / 4. iHealth 愛健康 - 健康新媒體（與商業週刊、Flipboard、57健康等合作）/ 5. 早餐吃麥片 - 健康、天然早餐飲食的提供者 (2015~今) / 6. 運動吃蛋白 - 健身者的補給網站 (2017~今)

column3: 台北市中正區忠孝西路一段66號32樓
column6: Would you like to work with a great team as a Software Engineer with focus on Navigation product development? Do you want to play a key role in revolutionizing how people reach their goals by developing high quality software which will be integrated with the latest TomTom devices?  Where do you want to be? We are looking for the best and brightest minds in C++ Development to join our Scrum team based in Taipei. You will ensure the high quality of the software that is developed  you will do this in many different ways from helping to plan sprints  getting involved in grooming of backlogs  discussing testing  writing tests  pair programming  code reviews  developing the code and working closely with other departments where needed.  What do we expect from you? There is no set route to become a Software Engineer at TomTom. But to be successful in this role  this is the kind of profile we have in mind: Must: • English skills (reading/writing/listening/speaking) • C/C++  STL (over 2 years of experience as a developer) • Knowledgeable about Linux platforms (over 2 years of experience as a developer) • Cross-platform development (over 2 years of experience as a developer) • System integration experience • Object-orientated software design abilities;  Good to have: • Knowledge of or experience in unit test frameworks; • Qt framework experience; • Navigation software experience • Automotive related software experience (GENIVI/MorrorLink) • Java/Python/shell scripting • OpenGL(ES) programming • Android/QNX experience • Performance tuning experience • HTML5 experience/Java script • Agile/SAFe experience  What do we offer? 1. An adventure in the cutting-edge field of digital mapping  traffic and navigation solutions; 2. The chance to work in a fast moving  innovative and international environment  dealing with all kind of different countries and cultures; 3. Among others  an online learning platform (1500 courses & 11000 e-books) as well as live speeches from software development gurus  like Uncle Bob; 4. Competitive salary and benefits package.  Who are we?  TomTom empowers movement. Every day millions of people around the world depend on TomTom to make smarter decisions. We design and develop innovative products that make it easy for people to keep moving towards their goals.  Our map-based components include map content  online map-based services  real-time traffic  and navigation software. Our consumer products include PNDs  navigation apps  and GPS sports watches. Our main business products are custom in-dash navigation systems and a fleet management system  which is offered to fleet owners as an online service with integrated in-vehicle cellular devices.  Our business consists of four customer facing business units: Consumer  Automotive  Licensing and Telematics.  Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Amsterdam  we have 4 000 employees worldwide and sell our products in over 36 countries. For further information  please visit www.tomtom.com  Want to learn more? Please like FB page https://www.facebook.com/AgileBrewery

column6: We are now looking for a Security System Software Engineer!  We are searching for a top-notch software engineer for an exciting and fun role on our Tegra software security team. You will work with the most advanced current and future generations of Tegra products and SOCs. You will join a team who's mission is to secure Tegra products such as Shield TV/Shield Tablets and various automotive products based on Tegra SOCs. This is great chance to create an impact on the industry working along side some of the top valued diverse minds in security software  with the goal to invent future product security technologies doing what you enjoy. If this sounds like a fun challenge  we want to hear from you!  What you will be doing: • You will design/architect security software solution in various software components such as secureboot  Secure OS on Tegra platform • You will develop Secure OS and Secure OS applications used in various security use cases such as secure key exchanging and web security • You will develop key android security features such as  SELinux/VerifiedBoot/Keystores • You will implement security software to protect high value media content such as 4K movies from Netflix/GooglePlay/Amazon Instant Video on Shield TV/Shield Tablet/Jetson and Automotive products • You will develop product security software such as fuzzer/threat modelling/security tools  triage and debugging of various software issues in complex system/applications  What we need to see: • You have a BS or MS degree in EE/CS/CE • You have more than 3 years of software development experience • You are excellent in C/C++ programming and debugging skills  Python is a plus • You have product security such as threat modelling/security tooling/Fuzzing  architecture  and design skills • You are experienced in secure code development and have the ability and flexibility to work and communicate  effectively in a multi-national  global corporate environment • Good understanding of Linux/Android operating system is highly desired  experience with low level software drivers and kernel is a bonus
column8: What we need to see: • You have a BS or MS degree in EE/CS/CE • You have more than 3 years of software development experience • You are excellent in C/C++ programming and debugging skills  Python is a plus • You have product security such as threat modelling/security tooling/Fuzzing  architecture  and design skills • You are experienced in secure code development and have the ability and flexibility to work and communicate  effectively in a multi-national  global corporate environment • Good understanding of Linux/Android operating system is highly desired  experience with low level software drivers and kernel is a bonus  Ways to stand out from the crowd: • Good communication and organization skills  with a logical approach to problem solving  good time management  and task prioritization • Excellent written and good oral communication skills in English • Self-motivated and able to work effectively across different functional teams with a minimum of supervision

column6: Job Description We are looking for a Back-End Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server  IoT devices  and the users. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your coworkers into the application. A basic understanding of front-end technologies is therefore necessary as well.  Responsibilities - Design  build  and maintain high performance  reusable  and reliable Javascript/Typescript/Python code - Integration of user-facing elements and IoT devices with server side logic - Building reusable code and libraries for future use - Optimization of the application for the best possible performance  quality and scalability - Help maintain code quality  organization  and automatization - Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs - Implementation of security and data protection - Design and implementation of data storage solutions

column1: CAD Tools Development Engineer -  台北
column2: NVIDIA_香港商輝達香港控股有限公司台灣分公司
column3: 台北市內湖區
column6: Please send your most updated English resume to  yvochen@nvidia.com  • 精通C++ /  Python / TCL  • 了解DFT/ DFP 流程  Verilog 及 ASIC design尤佳 • 工作地點: 台北  詳細說明如下: We are now looking for a highly motivated CAD Tools Development Engineer to join this dynamic and innovative CAD Research and Development team that innovates and crafts state-of-the-art tools that will be part of all our hardware.  NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. At NVIDIA  you will have the opportunity to work on some of the most incredible products on the market today from products like DGX-1  P100  the Shield to Tesla for Data Centers. Your work will touch every industry - from medical to auto  to robotics and more.  What you’ll be doing: As part of the CAD R&D team  you will be developing and supporting tools for all of NVIDIA's semiconductor products. You will work on the design and development of our next generation of 'Design for Test' (DFT) and 'Design for Power' (DFP) Tools. You will develop these in-house tools in the area of DFT and DFP using C++  Python and TCL.  • Architect highly automated and customizable design flows using software engineering with modular design and object-oriented techniques. • Work on flows to provide DFT  and low-power methodologies for industry-leading chip designs. • Support development of tools using C++/Python/TCL • Provide support for existing tools and flows • Assist DFT Methodology  Implementation and design teams with challenging DFT and power tools development tasks
column8: What we need to see: • MS in Electrical or Computer Engineering • Strong proficiency in C++ • Smart  diligent and motivated to work in our CAD group. • Knowledge or experience with DFT  Power is a plus • Familiar with Verilog and ASIC design • Software engineering: software design  algorithms  and QA • Strong proficiency in Python  Tcl  and C++ • Very good communication skills NVIDIA offers highly competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package. We have some of the most brilliant and talented people in the world working for us and  due to unprecedented growth  our world-class engineering teams are growing fast. If you're a creative and autonomous engineer with a real passion for technology  we want to hear from you.

column6: Overview Do you know how serious about Phishing mail threat to businesses? According to Verizon  67% of cyber espionage begins with a phishing email  and numerous reports and white papers demonstrate massive increases in the rate and severity of cyber-attacks on organizations! Social engineering poses a significant risk to businesses  with phishing being a common tactic.Employees are information security’s weakest link. Phish Insight is a SaaS that provides a flexible cloud base service to simulate any modern social engineering attacks to enables employee security awareness from training. It's the fast  efficient way to measure employee vulnerability while ramping up awareness of the seriousness of the risk. We wish we become the biggest security awareness platform in the world to educate enterprise employees.「You cannot save the world alone !」Join this team  you will be one of the heroes to protect the digital world. Job Responsibilities ·         Engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services—from inception and design  through deployment  operation and refinement.·         Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting  developing software platforms and frameworks  capacity planning and launch reviews.·         Maintain services once they are live by measuring and monitoring availability  latency and overall system health.·         Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation  and evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.·         Practice sustainable incident response and blameless postmortems.
column8: Qualification/Requirement ·         BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field involving coding (e.g.  physics or mathematics)  or equivalent practical experience.·         Experience with algorithms  data structures  complexity analysis and software design.·         Experience in one or more of the following: Python  Linux shell scripts.·         Experience in continuous integration and deployment automation tool  like Jenkins.·         Family with Windows or Linux administrator  networking  web server administration  relational database(PostgreSQL) management.·         Interest in designing  analyzing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems.·         Systematic problem-solving approach  coupled with strong communication skills and a sense of ownership and drive.·         Ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks.·         Experience working with container technology  such as Docker and Kubernetes will be plus.·         Experience with Cloud Computing and SaaS product operation will be plus.·         Fluent communication in English.·         Proactive  self-motivated  fast problem solving  and a team player.

column6: 月薪：6~9萬 職缺：Python Developer 1~2人  Join us in building the best e-commerce SaaS platform to revolutionize how retailers engage with shoppers for post-purchase activities. Linc is looking for Software Developers who are passionate about their craft  who thrive on challenge and who believe in success through collaboration – people who would complement our existing team of world class developers! We offer a fun  dynamic and result-driven environment. If scale and complexity in a high growth startup excites you  Linc is the right place to be.  You should be experienced  diligent  and passionate  ready to join the team to help us build and run our innovative and business-changing SaaS-based applications at the highest level of quality. You will be a solid contributor in the team  owner of major components  and an indispensable teammate to other software developers.  RESPONSIBILITIES * Build and maintain Linc’s SaaS application platform at the highest level of quality  service and availability * Design and implement new functionality and product enhancements * Participate in all phases of software development from planning  designing  implementation  testing  deployment  to day-to-day operation * Collaborate across entire product team to contribute to the analysis of functional requirements and overall system architecture * Document and communicate designs and interfaces for use by other engineers * Work and communicate with Sunnyvale colleagues closely across continents and timezones  KEY QUALIFICATIONS * 3+ years of experience in designing and developing large scale web applications * Proficient in Python programming language * Familiar with SQL relational database  Linux server environment and Git * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field * Fluent verbal and written English skills  HUGE PLUS * Silicon Valley company working experience (either in US or Taiwan) * AWS cloud experience * e-Commerce platform development experience  NOTE 1. Applicants are required to finish a Python coding test at home first. 2. We are not going to hire foreigners at this stage due to visa processing issue.

We currently offer opportunities for several full-time jobs. You'll be able to join the projects from product definition  system architecture to product industrialization.

column6: We are an exciting start-up delivering a PaaS platform for the Internet of Things.  The Ayla Platform™ is the industry’s only complete end-to-end solution for transforming everyday products into cloud-connected devices quickly  easily and economically.  Ayla combines its innovative and highly efficient technology with best-in-class hardware  applications  cloud-based services and digital information services to allow manufacturers to reinvent their products for the smartphone era.  We are looking for an exceptional Engineer to join the Ayla Device team.    <What You Will Be Doing> · Working in an engineering culture that is customer focused · Design and implement test suites for new product features  and to test new embedded communications modules. · Design and implement test suites for software products running in a Linux embedded environment. · Documentation of test plans and test reports for Ayla customers. · Design and implement automated testing frameworks for reliable regression testing of networking software across multiple device types. · Test devices using a broad range of connectivity protocols and technologies such as WiFi (802.11b/g/n/ac)  Bluetooth  Zigbee (802.15.4)  etc. · Play an important role in verifying and maintaining product quality  making a significant impact on Ayla’s success  <Desired Skills and Experience> · 5-7 years of experience developing automated test frameworks for networking software · Good knowledge of TCP/IP  HTTP(S)  and devices communicating with a RESTful web service · Experienced with scripting languages such as Python. · Familiarity with embedded C or C++. · Familiar with testing embedded devices  systems and microcontrollers. · Experience with Linux and associated gnu networking tools such as curl and OpenSSL. · Familiar with the software engineering processes needed to deliver high-quality software. · Familiar with development tools such as source control (git)  bug tracking (JIRA)  test management (TestRail) and JTAG debuggers. · Ready to work in a startup where you will be working in a lot of different technical areas  may wear many hats  and are prepared to tackle the unknown · BS/MS in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science (or equivalent)

column6: Job description/overview  In Mindtronic AI we are looking for a talented robotic scientist to join our research and innovation team. As part of this team  you will get involved in the development of cutting-edge technologies for the automobile industry  working along with a group of young and dynamic researchers in a familiar environment  and facing new and interesting challenges. Joining Mindtronic AI means working in a international environment  collaborating with our many front-line partners in the automobile sector  and becoming an important part on the development of commercial technologies with a huge potential exposure.  Location: Taipei Taiwan  Essential functions/ Job duties Selected candidate will be in part of the development of a multi-agent command blending project. This development includes the design and implementation of a real-time robot software architecture  sensor fusion mechanisms  car control and safety routines  fuzzy system  and human machine interface.  Main functions include: • Assist to design and implement vehicle navigation and autonomous operation. • Develop and implement algorithms for vehicle control. • Support AI team and help on AI system integration. • Field-test experiment design and result analysis. • Assist on product release  including certification process  integration control  customer support  and documentation.  Qualifications • MS degree in Robotics  Mechatronics or related • Mobile robotics - Including control (optimum control  predictive contro  ...)  perception (sensor processing  object recognition  ...)  and navigation (mapping  path planning  ...). • Sensor modeling and Sensor fusion: Including sensors such as cameras  LIDAR  Radar  or ultrasounds. • Strong programming skills in C/C++ and Python • Experience on critical real time system architecture (mixed-priority multi-threading systems). • Fluent communication in English.  Preferred Qualifications • Related research/industry experience will be taken in consideration. • Familiar with ROS and robot simulators (Gazebo or VRep). • Sensor processing libraries such as OpenCV and PCL. • Data analytics software (R  Matlab) • Machine learning and Deep learning skills.  About us MINDTRONIC AI Co. Ltd. is a start-up A.I. technology company founded in 2017 and has established an important partnership within automobile industry supply chain and ecosystem. Our research teams are located in Taiwan and the U.S. Our work is focused on Artificial Intelligence technology development  including Computer Vision  Computer Graphics  and Robotics applications  to bring innovative and revolutionary products to our customers.

column6: Job description/overview  Mindtronic AI is looking for a talents and AI researcher to join our research and innovation team. As part of this team  you will get involved in the development of cutting-edge technologies for the automobile industry  working along with a group of young and dynamic researchers in a familiar environment  and facing new and interesting challenges. Joining Mindtronic AI means working in a international environment  collaborating with our many front-line partners in the automobile sector  and becoming an important part on the development of commercial technologies with a huge potential exposure.  Location: Taipei Taiwan  Essential functions/ Job duties Selected candidate will be part of the development of a novelty solution for human machine interaction based on behavior analysis and assimilation. This role includes the integration of deep learning techniques for human recognition/monitoring  behavior classification  and human intention inference.  Main duties include: • Design and implement a robust architecture for human recognition and monitoring. • Design human behavior analysis algorithms  and study their applicability on human machine interaction. • Support the robotics team and help on AI system integration. • Field-test experiment design and result analysis. • Assist on product release  including certification process  integration control  customer support  and documentation.  Qualifications • MS degree in AI  Intelligent Systems or related. • At least 2 years of related research/industry experience. Fresh graduates with relevant personal projects (kaggle  github) are encouraged to apply. • Strong background about machine learning techniques and mechanisms such as: neuronal networks  pattern recognition  reinforcement learning  etc. • Familiar with computer vision and sensor processing for recognition/classification. • Strong programming skills (C/C++  Python).  Preferred Qualifications • Machine learning framework (TensorFlow  Caffe  …). • Data analytics (R  Matlab). • Multi agent systems and distributed consensus algorithms. • Robotics skills and knowledge about robotic frameworks (ROS)   About us MINDTRONIC AI Co. Ltd. is a start-up A.I. technology company founded in 2017 and has established an important partnership within automobile industry supply chain and ecosystem. Our research teams are located in Taiwan and the U.S. Our work is focused on Artificial Intelligence technology development  including Computer Vision  Computer Graphics  and Robotics applications  to bring innovative and revolutionary products to our customers.

column6: 歡迎具備後端程式與 DevOps 設計基礎，對於探索雲端架構與優化設計有熱忱的你加入我們，與優質團隊共同成長！  職務需求： 1. 有後端程式、RESTful API 與資料庫開發經驗，熟悉 Python 及 Golang 語言者佳。 2. 熟悉 Linux、shell script、git 源碼管理，對於容器化主流技術和相關平台有基本了解，熟悉 DevOps 流程與工具者佳。 3. 有系統建構、配置管理，打包部署，自動化測試撰寫與平台監控設計經驗者優先。 4. 對技術有強烈的進取心，具有良好的溝通能力和團隊合作精神 　 職位內容: 1. 網站或 APP 後端 API 程式開發，資料架構規劃，資料庫正規化設計 2. 參與雲端開發與運維流程設計與開發 3. 提昇雲端系統 (AWS) 穩定性、提高資源利用率及成本優化 4. 協同雲端架構師，提供客戶遷移系統至 AWS 之技術顧問服務 　 【公司與團隊簡介】 　　肯驛國際集團從事互聯網金融加值服務將近 20 年，目前營收主要來自電信、保險與銀行信用卡、企業 VIP 高端加值服務，擁有自己的白金客服中心與機場禮賓車隊，本身具備實際提供穩定收入、具體需求服務營運、銷售 channel 為後盾，從 B2B2C 到 B2C ，提供精緻生活與尊榮禮賓出行平台化服務。 　 　　肯驛訊息科技（idanbean）由一群專注在物聯網、雲端架構、銀行與企業 VIP 高端服務技術研發成員組成，團隊所累積的金流與服務加值整合、物聯網互通性與端到端垂直整合、軟硬體互動體驗設計經驗，設計 + 研發 / 維運（DevOps）緊密合作，提升創新服務產品研發能量，開拓了互聯網+、出行服務平台、O2O 智能票卷等產品線，與合作伙伴共同開拓智能轉型的新商機。 　 　◆ 2015/11 數據與服務研發部成立，核心團隊由電子大廠雲端服務與物聯網技術研發成員組成，結合原有資訊與服務維運部在銀行信用卡高端服務所累積的金流與服務整合串接經驗，開拓互聯網+與出行服務平台的產品線。 　◆ 2016/06 台北辦公室成立 　◆ 2016/09 整合 UI / UX 設計資源，讓設計 + 研發 / 維運（DevOps）更緊密合作，提升創新服務產品研發能量。 　◆ 2016/10 肯驛訊息科技籌備成立 　◆ 2017/03 成為 AWS 技術合作夥伴，AWS Summit 2017 高峰會開場影片指標廠商 　◆ 2017/08 肯驛訊息科技正式成立

column1: System Platform Power and Performance Software Engineer (Linux for TEGRA)
column2: NVIDIA_香港商輝達香港控股有限公司台灣分公司
column3: 台北市內湖區基湖路8號
column6: Work Location: Taiwan  Taipei  The NVIDIA Linux for Tegra software team is looking for a senior system power and performance software engineer who will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge mobile computing technologies built around the Tegra SoC.  What you will be doing:  Ideal candidates will have a thorough understanding of Linux kernel internals  power management infrastructure  and contemporary power management architectures for system-on-chip designs  with strong C programming and system-level debugging experience. Experience profiling application and system use-cases  and optimizing within specific device constraints is required.  Selected candidates will be required to work with an international team of hardware  system and software engineers in developing software for the next-generation of the mobile processors and SoCs. As a key member of the Linux for Tegra Power and Performance team  you will verify and improve power usage and performance data on the Tegra platforms and SDKs. • You will be responsible to measure and set target for the power and performance on the various Tegra platforms and software that runs on these platforms. • You will be working on improving the power and performance number by debugging and investigating into the software. • You will work with an international team of hardware  system and software engineers in developing software for the next-generation of the mobile processors and SoCs. • You will work closely with QA to establish test cases to ensure quality of the power and performance on the various supported platforms.
column8: What we need to see: • Bachelors Degree in EE  CS or CE with at least 3 years of relevant experience or an Advanced Degree with equivalent experience • Expert in C and proficient in scripting languages such as Python. • Thorough understanding of Linux kernel internals  power management infrastructure  and contemporary power management architectures for system-on-chip designs • Strong debugging and analytical skills • Strong communication skills and ability & desire to work as a great teammate. • Experience in profiling application and system use-cases  and optimizing within specific device constraints is required.

column6: Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! Take it easy in the morning  any time before 10AM is ok.  We are the leading Agile software development company in Taiwan. In Taipei we are looking for a Software Test Analyst who enjoys breaking the system.  What will you do  • Collaborating with Agile team to improve product quality & to perform software testing. • Acting as a quality coach within the domain of responsibility and drive a quality aware software development. • Test  planning & test case design   in Story- Feature- and System Levels. • Test execution (exploratory & automated tests) and reporting. • Bug reporting  analysis and error verification. • Contributing in Improving & building various test processes within development process.  What’s a must  • You get excited by designing software testing systems and your quality standards are over the top. • Speak your mind  ask questions  share ideas and curious about everything. • 4+ years of directly related experience in software testing  especially in test case analysis & design. • Strong skills in requirement and Data analysis for test scope definition and test case creation. • Coding skills in shell script  python.  What’s nice to have  • Bachelor's in Computer Science  Mathematics  Physics  Electrical Engineering or an equivalent qualification.  • ISTQB qualified. • Experience with SW testing management tools and error tracking tools (e.g. Jira  Quality Center/ALM) is an advantage.  What can you expect from us  • Freedom  fun  no hierarchy! • The opportunity to further grow your skills  we pay attention to your career. • We move fast like a “start-up” but have the benefits of a billion euro company.  • Team outings  innovation days  indefinite contract  flexible benefits  minimum 15 annual leave days  collective health insurance  health check pension scheme  up to 50% discount on products  bonus scheme.   What is TomTom  5000 employees worldwide and the majority works in Software engineering. We have been making built-in car navigation since 2008  introduced the connected car in 2010 and are a major player in the area of highly automated driving. Our customers are Renault  Audi  Fiat  Peugot  SsangYong  Toyota and many more.  Please apply through www.tomtom.com/careers. More info about TomTom Automotive can be found here.  Pre-employment screening and coding tests of all external candidates is part of the selection process. Feel free to send us a piece of code to show your skills.

column6: [About Vpon] 我們利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，進而建立數據產品 (Data Products)，將其應用在廣告投放，電商成效優化、O2O 等各種領域。   [About Data Science Team] 我們是一群由電腦科學家、統計學家和心理學家等跨領域組成的數據科學團隊 (Data Science Team)，深信著 “Data Drives Transactions”。  團隊的發展重點為廣告競價平台 (Real-Time Bidding Demand-Side Platform) 、數據管理平台 (Data Management Platform)，團隊的使命是幫助企業提升顧客終生價值 (Customer Lifetime Value)。   [About Job] • Lead the definition of feasible problems and reasonable measuring ways to drive business solutions • Partner closely with business and engineering teams to collect requirements  and provide assessment or suggestion • Develop user behavior predictive models with valuable findings from large-scale datasets  especially in the field of traveling related problems • Prototype and build machine learning pipelines to accelerate development life cycle • Demonstrate data visualizations with clear presentations of insights and business recommendations • Research machine learning techniques and optimization methods based on multi-source data to improve the quality of DMP product  [About You] • MS/PhD in Computer Science  Statistics  Math  Physics  Engineering  or equivalent experience • Excellent understanding of machine learning or statistical data analysis in theory and applications • Strong collaboration skills with software and DevOps engineers to build production-level products • Applied experience with handling and analyzing large-scale datasets • Experience with at least one modeling framework such as R  Scikit Learn  TensorFlow  or Keras • Expertise in programming languages such as Python  R  or Java • Fluency in SQL-like programming languages • Experience in Hadoop ecosystem such as Spark  Hive • Experience with cloud services such as AWS or GCP is a plus • Knowledge and experience in deep learning models is a plus

column6: 【關於伊雲谷】 伊雲谷數位科技是AWS大中華區第一間高級諮詢合作夥伴(AWS Premier Consulting Partner)，致力利用雲端優勢引領企業數位轉型。截至2018年1月，伊雲谷專業顧問與技術團隊已經獲得超過130張專業AWS證照，服務超過400位客戶以及50間系統整合商，合作客戶有拓元售票系統、台灣虎航、三立電視、MOMO等。 身為一間 born-in- cloud 的雲端專家，伊雲谷100%專注於提供AWS專業的顧問諮詢服務與技術支援，其中包括了雲端搬遷、DevOps、大數據、無伺服器服務(serverless)、容器服務(container)、及雲端託管服務(MSP)，以數位化的方式思考及實現企業的未來。  【職務內容】 ● 協助建構雲端服務系統  ● 開發前台及後台應用  ● 提供應用系統技術支援  ● 除錯及系統測試  ● 技術文件撰寫及系統流程圖繪製  ● 就開發過程所使用工具、技術進行內部知識分享   ● 歡迎應屆畢業生應徵，我們會有OJT在職訓練 ● 熟悉至少一種其他程式語言：C#  Java  Python  Go ● 瞭解關聯式及非關聯式資料庫 ：MySQL  MongoDB ● 必需有主動學習的意願及能力 ● 熟悉 Node.js 並有實務開發經驗

column6: 加入 FLUX，一起來打造創客工具！  我們相信提供直覺、易用的數位自造工具幫助人們實現創意，可以為世界創造更多價值。FLUX 團隊於 2014 年 3 月在臺北草創，早期即凝聚了硬體、軟體、和設計的各方人才，帶著共同對設計和自造精神的熱愛而成立。同年前往美國矽谷發展，並將結合 3D 列印、雷射雕刻等數位創作功能的數位成型機 － FLUX Delta 放上 Kickstarter 群眾募資平台，成功募得 164 萬美金並打破臺灣歷史紀錄。產品亦獲得德國紅點設計獎、德國 iF Award 金質獎、CES 創新獎等業界知名獎項肯定。  2016 年，成功將第一代產品出貨至世界各地 64 個國家。2017 年，推出第二代 FLUX Delta，以及 Beambox 桌上雷射切割機。今年，FLUX 將持續帶著對數位創作的熱忱，為世界各地持續提供最棒的產品。  現在，FLUX 正在尋找一樣熱愛科技、設計、創作和生活的你。  【相關連結】 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2117384013/flux-all-in-one-3d-printer-unlimited-elegant-simpl 德國 iF Award 金質獎: http://ifworlddesignguide.com/entry/173220-flux-delta Techcrunch 報導：https://techcrunch.com/2014/11/11/fluxs-3d-printer-is-also-a-scanner-laser-engraver-and-more-thanks-to-a-modular-design/  【徵才條件】 - 高速學習能力，能在不同情境下選擇最具效率的架構與框架 - 對最新的科技與技術充滿熱情 - 具備良好的溝通表達能力和團隊合作精神 - 在變化迅速極快的環境中能夠有效率的獨立作業  【經驗需求】 不拘，新鮮人可。  【技能需求】 - 熟悉 JavaScript - 熟悉 C or C++ - 產品技術面跨度大，會有基礎培訓  【加分條件】 - 熟悉 React 開發環境 - 熟悉 Git 版本控制、單元測試以及 Jenkins 持續整合開發環境 - 熟悉 Linux 開發環境 - 網站開發相關經驗 (Django  PHP  Node.js  SQL) - 熟悉 Python - Electron 使用經驗 - STM32  Arduino  Raspberry Pi 嵌入式系統開發相關經驗 - ROS 相關經驗  【工作內容】 - FLUX Studio 開發: 開發桌面 Web-Based 應用，整合 Python & C 後端 API。 - 3D 列印機與雷射切割機韌體開發: 嵌入式系統韌體開發與優化 (C語言)。 - 新產品設計與開發 - 以專業技能角度思考如何提升使用者體驗  【福利制度】 - 舒適的辦公環境、活力的工作夥伴、提供免費零食飲料 - 美國日本出差機會 - 技術類書籍免費補助購買 - 辦公室 Makerspace 三寶免費用 - 3D 列印，雷射切割，桌上 CNC - 國際化的產品以及世界級的舞台讓你發揮 - 周休二日、彈性上下班時間 - 享有勞、健保 - 每年特休 20 天 - 員工分紅入股及選擇權  【聯絡人/連絡方式】 請 Email 你的個人簡歷與作品集 (你的 Github、網站 Link 或其他作品介紹資料) 至 info@flux3dp.com

column6: Overview: Trend Micro Incorporated  a global cloud security leader  creates a world safe for exchanging digital information with its Internet content security and threat management solutions for businesses and consumers. A pioneer in server security with over 25 years’ experience  we deliver top-ranked client  server and cloud-based security that fits our customers’ and partners’ needs  stops new threats faster  and protects data in physical  virtualized and cloud environments. We are looking for DevOps talent .Join our Service Delivery team under Information Service Group where you will work on new technologies and continuously help us to improve the service quality. You will use functional expertise to act as an advisor to management and make recommendations on more complex projects.You will use professional concepts and company policies & procedures to solve a wide range of difficult problems creatively and practically.You will be responsible for deployment and operations of Cloud enabled applications and services in AWS and Private Cloud infrastructure.You will have experience with DevOps methodologies and will be working directly with application developers  guiding the development and implementation of Cloud applications  systems and processes.You will use DevOps and agile principles  utilizing Jenkins to enable CI / CD of various cloud applications. You will work independently on day to day monitoring and operations of cloud and legacy applications. You will be required to develop automation using scripting languages.You will also be able to handle critical operation tasks as well as on demand requests.  Essential Functions:Operations and administration of VMWare & AWS environment.DevOps CI / CD integration using JIRA  Jenkins.Scripting (BASH  Perl  Ruby) and building required automation and tools on an ad-hoc basis.Setup new monitoring and automation of support for various cloud jobs and processes.

Even better if you have:Experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) technologies: Cloud Formation  EC2  S3  EMR  Autoscale  Cloudwatch.Knowledge of one of the container technologies (Docker/Kubernetes).Experience with CI / CD using JIRA  Jenkins .Java programming experience.Experience providing production operations support and 24/7 supportExperience in designing  monitoring and supporting a large-scale & highly available systems.Understanding of protocols/technologies like SOA  HTTP  SSL  LDAP  JDBC  SQL  HTML  XML.Successful track record of providing production support for large-scale distributed systems  withexperience in automation  production migration and deployment with minimal down time.Teamwork & collaboration skills to work across organizations and lead cross-functional teams.Communication & stakeholder management skills.Problem solving skills to develop quick and sound solutions to resolve complex issues.

column1: DevOps Engineer for US-based startup in Taipei (Annual salary: NT$1.1M+)
column2: 科迪股份有限公司
column3: 台北市信義區
column6: Kloudless’s mission is to make it easy for companies to integrate software applications. We’re building towards a future where any software application can be accessed through Kloudless.  We’re looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer to join our engineering team.  As a DevOps Engineer  you will work closely with the other engineering teams to ensure that the Kloudless Platform is performant  reliable  and maintainable. You will also be involved at every level of the Kloudless Infrastructure  for both our publicly accessible API as well as our on-premises container deployments. We are looking for candidates that are able to automate processes  manage infrastructure  and help drive success at all levels of the platform.  ★ Responsibilities • Improve the Operator Experience for users of our on-premises VM and Docker container. • Improve efficiency of our build and deployment pipeline for application code and container images. • Apply industry best practices to maintain and scale our API platform. • Consult across engineering and product teams to ensure that any updates and improvements are scalable and maintainable. • Lead projects from conception to implementation in a small  but fast moving team. • Support our live production systems to diagnose and solve issues across the application and operating system stack.  ★ Technical Requirements • Strong DevOps and/or Linux systems administration and network engineering skills. 3+ years’ experience in a DevOps or Systems Administration role preferred. • Strong grasp of the software development lifecycle  and experience with a modern general purpose programming language such as Python  Ruby  JavaScript  Java  C#  PHP or similar. • Strong command-line/Bash skills. • Experience with version control software like Git or Mercurial. • Experience working with and automating server administration processes in an IaaS environment like AWS or Azure. • Experience working with PostgreSQL preferred. • Familiarity with configuration/infrastructure management tools like Puppet  Salt-Stack  or Chef is preferred. • Familiarity with CI tools such as Jenkins is a plus. • Familiarity working with monitoring tools like Icinga  Sensu  Ganglia  Statsd  Graphite  or the TICK stack is a plus. • Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.  ★ General Qualifications • An entrepreneurial mindset. Eager to join a dynamic  fast-paced  startup environment  and take the initiative on shaping our client-facing engineering role. • Confident in coming up with innovative solutions  and challenging the status quo. Can make quick decisions based on business demands. • Excellent problem solving skills and attention to detail. • A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science  Engineering  or a comparable field is preferred.  ★ Benefits • Competitive compensation and stock option plan • Benefits package including health insurance • Flexible paid time off and work from home policies • Free snacks  lunches  dinners  and team outings • Work in a modern office in the Xinyi District  just one block from Taipei 101! • Gym/wellness reimbursement  ★ About Kloudless Kloudless is the go-to platform for enterprise software integrations. Businesses use our unified API products to connect to many kinds of enterprise applications like Salesforce  Box  Dropbox  G Suite  Slack and more. With Kloudless  developers can stop building tedious and expensive one-off integrations by using Kloudless to build once and integrate many. We are trusted by more than 15 000 developers in over 4 000 organizations.  Kloudless is backed by top tier investors including Aspect Ventures  Alibaba  Vivek Ranadive (Founder of TIBCO)  David Sacks (Founder of PayPal  Yammer)  and Tim Draper (investor in Box  Tesla  SpaceX).  ★ Salary Range (薪資範圍)     Annual (年薪新台幣): 1 000 000元 - 1 400 000元  ★ 務必附上英文履歷投遞此職缺，缺件者概不考慮！★  ★ REQUIRED: Please provide your English résumé. Thanks!★

column6: #新團隊擴編徵才，專職大數據整合加值與創新服務應用，歡迎對數據分析有熱情，期盼數據應用落地的好手加入。職務內容1.資料科學最新方法與工具應用與研究。2.數據平台搭建： 使用AWS/GCP/Azure 或 hadoop/cloudera 建置數據處理平台。3.大數據平台架構設計、建置，管理、維運與問題解決。4.網路數位軌跡採集與清洗。5.協助團隊建置數據處理流程 Data Pipeline、ETL及數據建模，自動化數據處理流程。6.數據相關API開發與串接7.大數據架構新技術探索及研究，評估專案方法與使用技術，提出合適的方案與建議。8.使用統計，數學 機器學習等方法挑戰實際商業活動的數據分析。9.配合公司運營策略，推動資料收集、個資安全等目標，並從中協助組織發展。職涯發展身為資料科學團隊一員，將數位行銷、人力資源、以及集團各部門共同合作，培養專案管理與大數據處理、分析、洞察能力，用以提升產業應用層次、優化客戶體驗，最後成為具備多元思考與分析能力的資料科學家。我們重視的特質及能力具備主動學習新知的企圖心與能力，您需要具備新應用自主規劃與研發能力，熟悉數據/雲端平台的操作與維運，並樂於分享與教導後進。

column6: Ubitus Inc.  a world leading cloud gaming company  owns large-scale data and GPU computing power. To utilize such tremendous amount of computing power and data to realize strategic AI products  we are seeking a smart and enthusiastic expert with “can-do” and “eager-to-learn” attitude to join our AI Team.  Ubitus AI team focused on AI playing games and also applied AI on many other areas  especially on computer vision related. We always applied the cutting edge algorithm  technology such as (Docker  Kubernetes  and Blockchain) and process such as (Agile and DevOps) to narrow the gap between research results and the commercial market. We look forward to engineers who eager to gain mastery of AI joining our team.  The role of the AI engineer/scientist focuses on applying AI algorithms and generating models to realize commercial products.  RESPONSIBILITIES: • Design and verify data cleaning and feature selection/transformation algorithms for structured and unstructured data mixture  and aggregate valuable information • AI model training and tuning to create scalable solutions • Cooperate with software engineers to establish scalable  efficient  automated processes for enterprise-level management of AI applications with schedules • Research  design  implement  and verify novel AI approaches for new business problems • Explain and compare prediction performance in terms of accuracy and/or efficiency to improve the models • Cooperate with other machine learning experts to contribute for the greater good of Ubitus  QUALIFICATIONS: • B.S.  M.S.  or Ph.D. in computer science  math  statistics  or related fields (focus in AI or ML a plus) • Strong problem-solving ability • Strong programming skills (object-oriented and functional paradigms) • Profound understanding of general AI research and practice  with data analysis and modeling experiences • Expert in the theory and practice of at least one reliable AI algorithm • Familiar with Linux/Unix • Comfortable with learning new algorithms and technologies  NICE-TO-HAVE: • Good English comprehension and communication skills  written and verbal • Experience with Apache Spark  Hadoop  Tabuleau  Tensorflow  Caffe2  OpenCV  Keras  Computer Vision  Python  Java  Scala  Computer Vision • Proven track record of AI/ML contests such as Kaggle or publications to make deep learning models work in practice • Experience with large-scale data and distributed systems • Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2  S3  EKS  EMR  Data Pipeline  IAM  etc.) • Coding lover • Active in communities in computer programming  theoretical math/computer science  and/or applied statistics

column6: We are an exciting start-up delivering a PaaS platform for the Internet of Things.  The Ayla Platform™ is the industry’s only complete end-to-end solution for transforming everyday products into cloud-connected devices quickly  easily and economically.  Ayla combines its innovative and highly efficient technology with best-in-class hardware  applications  cloud-based services and digital information services to allow manufacturers to reinvent their products for the smartphone era.  We are looking for a talented  motivated and experienced Professional Service Engineer for supporting customers. The candidate is expected to have strong communication  must-have attribute and ability to learn quickly. You will directly discuss with the customer and provide tier-2 support.   <MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS> 1. Minimum of 5-year experience working with embedded system(including 1-year customer facing at least) 2. C programming and debugging skills 3. Embedded RTOS(FreeRTOS  ThreadX) and Linux Application experience 4. Networking experienced is preferred - Wi-Fi  ZigBee  Bluetooth  Restful API 5. Ability to multi-task & prioritize  highly organized & detailed Oriented  <PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS> 1. Strong experience in Linux and MCU 2. Strong communication skills are preferred 3. Script language (Python  Shell)  <HOW YOU WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN AYLA> 1. Provide the technical support for the Ayla products     a. Architecture     b. Development 2. Act as third level of support responding to customer inquiries received through e-mail  telephone or other communication method and related to any range of the Ayla products. Make inquiries to determine the nature and extent of problem and to isolate areas of concern. Identify causes of problems and provide solutions to customers.  3. Develop technical solutions & guides and anticipate different programs     a.QA test program     b. Utility development     c. Documentation

column6: We are looking for an enthusiastic and engaged software engineer with experience in system software development to join the GPU SW team. You will design key aspects of our production GPU kernel drivers and embedded SW. You should demonstrate the ability to excel in an environment with complex software and hardware designs.  What you’ll be doing: • You'd work closely with both hardware engineers and other software engineers to design  develop  and debug features for our GPUs and mobile system-on-chip (SOC) devices. • You would be heavily involved to define and create the backbone of the large system software to produce our world-class products. • You will follow the devices all the way through the development process to the customer desktops  notebooks  workstations  HPC  and gaming console products that are used throughout the world.
column8: What we need to see: • You should have a BS  MS or PhD degree in Computer Engineering  Computer Science  or related degree. • 5+ years of significant software development experience. • You can demonstrate a hand on technical background; excellent C programming  Perl/Python  and low-level driver experience. • You are an asset if you have familiarity with computer system architecture  microprocessor  and microcontroller fundamentals (caches  buses  memory controllers  DMA  etc). • Kernel experience with Linux  Android  Chrome  or Windows systems. • Experience with complex system-level debugging is invaluable. Ways to stand out from the crowd: • Deep understanding of Compiler/LLVM techniques. • Familiarity with programming language/security concepts; this includes testing techniques and a familiarity with static code analysis  dynamic analysis  fuzzing  negative testing and other techniques. • Experience on big complex system-level SW build flow/maintenance/Open Source Project. • Experience with embedded system SW concepts  e.g.: RTOS and overlay programming models.

column6: DESCRIPTION  We are seeking an enthusiastic and aspiring backend developer with “can-do” attitude and willing to embrace new techniques to join our Core Services Team.  Ubitus is a world leading cloud gaming company that not only gives users high-quality gaming experience over hundreds of game servers but also provides GPU-as-a-Service solutions.  The role of Core Services Team focuses on developing reliable and scalable server-side applications. As a backend developer  you will have opportunity to solve high-load  high-availability  and high-scalability backend-related problems. Besides  you will also opportunity to collaborate with our data analysts to engineer the system data to improve user experience and identify server issues.   RESPONSIBILITIES  • Develop platform applications that involve RESTful API implementation and database operations in a distributed environment • Collaborate with other teams to make proper API design  architecture  and implementation across services. • Monitor  optimize  and troubleshoot platform performance and identify abnormal behavior. • Design and build data pipelines for structured and unstructured data and aggregate valuable information • Develop tools to help deploy applications and scale rapidly.   REQUIREMENTS  • Must have great enthusiasm in information technology and is highly self-motivated and eager to learn • Excellent communication skills  written and verbal • B.S. in computer science or related field   PLUSES  • Experience in Linux • Familiar with RDBMS  NoSQL  and data modeling • Familiar with Golang  Python  and Java • Familiar with AWS S3  EC2  Lambda  etc.

Candidates should embrace an environment where team-members may be asked to contribute in unexpected ways.  An ideal candidate will have all of the following:  • Thrive in a fast paced  high-energy environment • Execute multiple responsibilities simultaneously  with the ability to react to changing priorities • Exceptional organizational skills; ability to perform and prioritize multiple tasks seamlessly with excellent attention to detail • Passion for technology  a drive for improvement  and a willingness to try new things • Extreme flexibility and a preference for the “start-up” business culture • Thrive in a team environment that values work ethic  professionalism  competence  and reliability • Be committed to high levels of quality  customer service  and client satisfaction • An innovative thinker with a track record for translating strategy into action and output • Ability to communicate clearly in English and Mandarin including excellent writing and editing abilities • Enthusiasm for working in a multi-cultural environment • Familiarity in performing basic data analysis and a proactive approach to problem-solving • Positive attitude  upbeat personality  and preferably a sense of humor • Interest in the investment management industry • Experience in project management with demonstrated track record of delivering projects on time • Experience building  formatting and editing PowerPoint presentations • Experience with basic editing of graphics and images and a good eye for design and visual aesthetics • General understanding of the principles of Marketing with a desire to rapidly expand their knowledge of the field

column1: Imagineer (Data Engineering team 數據分析工程團隊 )
column2: Migo_熱鬧點科技有限公司
column3: 台北市大安區光復南路438號12樓
column6: 【Job summary】  Are you looking for working across the organization and defining the problem by your own? Do you have a keen imagination and a mind for solving complex problems? Do you have a desire to build user-centric solutions that transform emerging markets? Migo designs and builds technology to close the digital divide for the mass market in emerging markets. Our technology involves a combination of hardware  networking  wireless  and software technology distributed through local neighborhood retail hotspots  then to consumers’ mobile phones.  Migo’s Data Engineering Team helps build and use the data tools that inform our most important and most complex decisions related to our product  marketing  sales  and operations strategies.   你相信數據反映真實，喜歡抽絲剝繭讓數據說話的人嗎？你渴望全面跨部門了解公司運作、並大膽假設小心求證嗎？你享受解謎的過程，並勇敢面對複雜又龐大問題？如果你想要帶給世界一些正面的改變，或許你就是我們在找的人！Migo企圖解決數位落差的挑戰，自行研發軟體技術、硬體設備、傳輸系統，讓開發中國家消費者能以親近的價格於我們佈設的熱點下載影音內容，並能夠於行動裝置上離線觀看，不再受到網路的限制。  Migo’s Data Engineering Team將負責建構數據分析工具，幫助Migo各部門解決各種複雜的問題，提供business insight並根據數據做決策。Data Engineering Team 透過敏捷式開發各種跨部門專案，如果你喜歡步調快、變化多端的工作環境，不僅握有一身專業更期待自己成為跨領域人才，有滿滿的學習能量，歡迎加入我們！  【Responsibility】 • Build and use the analytical tools needed to deal with massive data sets to uncover important business insights • Lead the end-to-end development of data products such as recommendation systems  data warehouses  business intelligence dashboards  and machine learning models  • Interpret Migo’s operational data to identify high-customer-impact problems  propose solutions  and test hypotheses in an iterative cycle • Collaborate daily on our product and business strategy with teams across the organization • Develop a global perspective on innovation  build your expertise across various industries  and build a three-dimensional understanding of the current and future emerging market context • 建構並使用分析工具來處理大量數據，並發掘企業商業洞察 • 負責開發數據產品，如：推薦系統、資料倉儲、BI儀表板、機器學習模型等 • column6: Good day  candidate. Your mission  should you choose to accept it  involves the security solution in tons of IoT devices. It is a critical problem for more and more IP enabled devices in home and industrial environment  as well as connected vehicle  sensors and more. Due to lack of security concept and hardware resource limitation on low-end devices  IoT builders may not aware potential risks or design proper solution when they build on their product. We are building a breakthrough technology that can provide different level of security on IoT device. Also support different platforms and kernels. It should be a flexible and scalable architecture to support the coming IoT growing.We have selected a professional team and work on this solution with some great result  but it is essential to have your join to achieve the mission. You have 14 days to reach Trend Micro Taiwan HR for this position.You should not disclose the detail of the solution and technologies to irrelevant members. As always  should any member of your team abuse such cutting edge technology illegally  they will be send to authorities for corresponding punishment.We list down your responsibilities and requirement below  you should read it carefully.This message will self-destruct once the position be fulfilled. Good luck.[Responsibilities] 1. Review design and code for security related module2. Identify possible flaw or side effect before release3. Hack testing sample or put our solution in extreme situation4. Develop efficient way to prove/disprove the solution5. Automation script and CI/CD improvement6. Performance evaluation7. Study new methodologies/platforms and new threads8. Work with server team to ensure the robustness of the solution9. Complete task as promise  able to work standalone and update progress proactively10. Keep secret  know what can do and what cannot do

column6: 職位敘述  影像處理軟體工程師負責開發影像處理程序與邏輯設計，必須有實際產品設計經驗，強的邏輯與程式設計能力，與溝通的能力。需有資料庫與後端資料庫與大數據的整理的概念。  大學或碩士以上影像處理，數學，電腦工程相關學系畢業，成績須為3.5GPA以上。  責任: - 使用C  C++  Python於Linux上開發 - 使用TensorFlow  OpenCV等影像處理AI deep learning工具 - 開發與整合嵌入式系統上的IP Camera streaming bridging 程式 - 與資料庫溝通並存取資料 - 後台資料存取分析程式  技能需求 - 熟悉C/C++/Python語言，並於Linux系統上開發 - 熟悉OpenCV  TensorFlow，了解YOLO  R-CNN  SSD等演算與應用原理 - 熟悉影像處理分析 - 熟悉H.264  H.265  HLS  MJPEG等影像處理傳輸的程式設計  加分 - 具備軟體工程概念(software process  design pattern) - 熟悉Linux嵌入式系統上的程式開發  Position Requirement  Video Image Software Developer is in charge of develop software that takes video stream from IP Camera  process  analyze and store related information into the big data.  Build AI that analyze  learn and suggest from the big data collected.  Strong math  programming skill  logic  and communication a must.  Experience on developing on a real production product is required.  BS / MS degree with 3.5GPA+ in Computer Science  Math  or Image processing programming related research a must. Responsibilities - Use and modify TensorFlow  OpenCV to perform real-time stream analysis - Develop and maintain video streaming application take and process the IP camera streaming data - Communication with databases and embedded system - Develop and analyze the backend big data collected   Programming Skills and Qualifications - Experienced Python/C/C++ developer to work on Linux coding environment - Strong knowledge of structural programming - Familiarity with SQL databases  network architecture - Ability to develop and work on Linux operating system  Plus - familiarity with H.264  H.265  HLS  MJPEG and other video streaming protocol development - Understanding of software process  design pattern  若你真的懂，這個工作對你來說就會很簡單。若以保密為由無法展示你自己寫的東西，沒展示到就代表你沒有這東西。  This job should be easy if you know what you are doing  if you can’t demo a code  then means you don’t have the coding skill.

column6: We're looking for a DevOps engineer who can take our team to the next level. Our DevOps Engineer role will be responsible for server setup  maintenance and automation for our clients Asia-Pacific facing business.  This role will be one of the first of a larger team  and will be instrumental in setting up tools  processes and documentation for the group in the future.   Our ideal candidate has a good base of technical skills and is able to speak and write at a conversational level in both Mandarin Chinese and English. He or she is Entrepreneurial and is excited to get in on the ground level of a new and exciting software business.   Key Responsibilities:   Work with local team and our client in Europe to automate processes  releases and integrate new customers quickly and effectively. Maintain  monitor and develop infrastructure  tools and processes so we can scale to more clients faster.  Technical Skills required:  - Strong background in Linux / Unix Administration - Experience building and administering LAMP or distributed web applications  　and related open-source software. - Experience with commercial CDN’s and monitoring technologies. - Able to automate processes and workflows via shell  python  　or similar scripting languages. - Experience with build and release automation. - Experience with cloud infrastructure like AWS  Rackspace  　or Azure is preferred. - Experience with virtualize architecture  like docker  kernel virtual machine 　or kubernetes. - Experience with config automation like Ansible  Puppet  　Vagrant is preferred. - Experience with load balance like  haproxy  lvs  nginx. - Experience with Varnish or similar reverse-proxy software is preferred. - Experience with RTMP or HLS video is preferred.
