column6: At Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)  we live by three core values that drive our business: Partner. Innovate. Act. These values combine to help us create important work all over the world to advance how people live and work.   HPE makes Hybrid IT simple. HPE helps customers to design the right mix of Hybrid IT to serve their unique needs. We bring next generation infrastructure that uses intelligent software to simplify and accelerate the delivery of new apps  services and business insights. Providing with new ways to deliver and manage IT on-premises and in the cloud.  In a typical day as a Test Executive Software Developer  you would  Designs  develops  troubleshoots and debugs software programs for software enhancements and new products. Develops software including operating systems  compilers  routers  networks  utilities  databases and Internet-related tools. Determines hardware compatibility and/or influences hardware design.  Responsibilities:   •Designs enhancements  updates  and programming changes for portions and subsystems of systems software  including operating systems  compliers  networking  utilities  databases  and Internet-related tools. •Analyzes design and determines coding  programming  and integration activities required based on general objectives and knowledge of overall architecture of product or solution. •Writes and executes complete testing plans  protocols  and documentation for assigned portion of application; identifies and debugs  and creates solutions for issues with code and integration into application architecture. •Leads a project team of other software systems engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable  cost effective and high quality solutions for assigned systems portion or subsystem. •Collaborates and communicates with management  internal  and outsourced development partners regarding software systems design status  project progress  and issue resolution. •Represents the software systems engineering team for all phases of larger and more-complex development projects. Provides guidance and mentoring to less- experienced staff members. •Provides guidance and mentoring to less- experienced staff members.  Education and Experience Required:   •Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering  Computer Engineering  or Computer Science •Software development experience in the computer industry •Demonstrated proficiency in the Perl  C/C++/C# programming languages •Experience working with web programming languages such as Java  or PHP  •Experience working as an Apache web server administrator would be beneficial; •Experience in compiling programs with Make for different flavors of HP-UX and Linux; •Experience with database development (SQL) and management would be beneficial •Experience writing C/C++/C# classes/applications connecting to MSSQL would be beneficial •Experience designing and developing large software applications •Experience in Software Testing  and Problem Solving •Experience in supporting  maintaining and documenting software functionality • Able to Integrate software with existing systems  •Able to evaluate and identify new technologies for implementation •Extensive knowledge of computer architecture - x86 and x64 would be beneficial. •Experience with software development tools  debuggers  source control  code analyzers •Experience developing HP-UX and Linux administration and applications would be beneficial •Effective presentation  written communication  and verbal communication skills If you are interested and have right qualifications  then apply now!   We offer: • A competitive salary and extensive social benefits • Diverse and dynamic work environment • Work-life balance and support for career development  • Want to know more about HPE? Then let’s stay connected! https://www.facebook.com/HPECareers  https://twitter.com/HPE_Careers

column6: Garena 深信只要抱持著一顆赤子之心及熱情的態度，就能將工作與生活中看似全無關聯的一切串聯起來，鋪設一條通往成功的康莊大道。同時也希望所有具有相同特質及使命感的人，都能加入 Garena，在此實現他們的夢想與目標。   系統管理組包含 MIS 系統工程師、Infra 系統工程師及 Linux 系統工程師，負責所有的基礎系統與網路設計與建置、辦公室與遊戲機房的資安管理、外部公司 Event 的 IT 技術支援及各種 IT 相關問題的最終防線。本SRE職缺即隸屬於 Linux 系統工程師 的任務範圍之下。  工作內容 1. 與開發、技術維運、Infra團隊、及專案負責人溝通，完成網站建置與確保服務的效能、安全性、穩定性。 2. 建置與維護自動化部署(CI/CD)系統，加速專案部署流程。 3. 開發與建置監控系統。 4. 網站、資料庫以及其他服務日常備份。 5. 鑑定、討論、解決攸關服務穩定性的問題，避免問題重複發生。 6. 為各種服務架設、環境建置撰寫流程與使用文檔。 7. 接受On-call的工作日程，最快的時間解決隨時可能發生的影響服務正常運行的問題。  其他條件 1. 資訊 / 電腦 / 網路相關領域之大學或研究所學歷。 2. 了解OSI架構、HTTP/HTTPS、TCP/IP、DNS、SMTP、CDN。 3. 孰悉Linux(Ubuntu  Centos  openSUSE)環境建置與性能調配。 4. 孰悉NGINX、Apache等Web Server架設以及設定調校。 5. 孰悉MySQL、Redis、Memcached設定與調校。 6. 孰悉Python、Shell、Bash、C、Perl中至少一種語言。 7. 善用開源軟體或自行開發工具。 8. 獨立思考、細節導向、自律自學。 9. 具耐性、富責任感、團隊精神。  加分條件 1. 具備架設監控系統經驗(Zabbix  icinga  Cacti  Nagios  etc.)。 2. 具備Git、SVN、Jenkins、Maven等CI/CD工具使用經驗。 3. 具備Ansible、Saltstack、Chef、Puppet等自動化部署經驗。 4. 了解服務Load-balancing、HA概念或具備實體Load-balancer(F5  A10  etc.)操作經驗。 5. 具備架設Log收集分析工具經驗(ELK  Graylog  Splunk  etc.)。 6. 孰悉GCP、AWS、Azure、Openstack等雲端服務。 7. 了解Container概念，具備Docker、Kubernetes、Rkt等建置與操作經驗。 8. 對軟體定義架構(SDI)有經驗或極大興趣(Openstack  Ceph  Opendaylight  etc.)。 9. 熱衷於遊戲與新科技。

column2: 願境網訊股份有限公司_KKBOX
column3: 台北市南港區三重路19-3號一樓
column6: *Purpose of HiringLead the development of recommender system*SummaryKKBOX is the leading music streaming company in Asia  possessing more than 10 millions of music entries to serve users' daily needs. Nevertheless  when confronted with vast amount of songs  it becomes difficult for users to ferret out their desired ones. The mission of Research Team is to dig out a means of organizing millions of songs in all aspects you can imagine. In addition  we attempt to understand our customers' needs by data analysis. We work closely with other excellent teams to deliver better and better services using our techniques and discoveries.We are seeking for a senior research engineer responsible for leading recommendation related projects. You will communicate with project managers to know the needs  translate into machine learning problem and design solutions for it. You will also give directions to our academic partners and our research engineers that makes our recommender system into the next level.*Responsibility- communicate with project managers to know the needs and respond solutions they can understand- translate the project needs into a machine learning problem and cooperate with our research engineers to design an algorithm to solve it- design both offline experiments and build online A/B tests to evaluate the performances of systems- give research directions to academic partners and our research engineers*Requirement- Expertise in recommender system theoretically with a broad understanding of related issues like cold-start  diversity  evaluation- Hands on Experiences in building recommendation engine in production is a plus- Experience in running online A/B tests is a plus- Great communication skills- Experiences in agile software development process is a plus*Other Professional Needs- Proficient in Linux  Unix systems  and Git.- Experience in programming in python or scala
column8: 特別的專業訓練需求- Proficient in Linux  Unix systems  and Git.- Experience in programming in python or scala此工作所需具備的能力及行為特質- Expertise in recommender system theoretically with a board understanding of related issues like cold-start  diversity  evaluation- Experience in building recommendation engine in production is a plus- Experience in running online A/B tests is a plus- Great communication skills
